document.full_text: apple is usually ultrasecretive about coming product announcements, but on tuesday the company pre-announced a number of new software plans a week before a presentation that will be led by steve jobs.
document.title: why did apple pre-announce its announcement?
lines_and_colors: apple is usually ultrasecretive about coming product announcements, but on tuesday the company pre-announced a number of new software plans a week before a presentation that will be led by steve jobs.
